citations.narrative:
The goat/sheep and pig shelter is not large enough to allow all the animals to go into it and lie down at one time. A
larger shelter or multiple shelters need to be provided to afford them protection and to prevent discomfort from
inclement weather.
Correct by: 06-30-17.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.127
FACILITIES, OUTDOOR. 
The goat/sheep and pig shelter is not large enough to allow all the animals to go into it and lie down at one time.  A
larger shelter or multiple shelters need to be provided to afford them protection and to prevent discomfort from
inclement weather.
Correct by:  06-30-17.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
